addon_summary: Set up your Stremio account with just a few clicks.
what_does_it_do_desc: Stremio Account Bootstrapper lets you set up your Stremio account with just a few clicks by bootstrapping a preset into your account. It's handy for newcomers, those who want a solid foundation to build their setup on, or to speed up the process of setting up new accounts for family members or friends.
which_addons_title: What addons might be included in the presets? (depends on the selected preset)
instructions_summary: You can access the step-by-step instructions here.
instructions_1: Log in using your Stremio credentials or get the Stremio Authkey. If you have created your account through Facebook, please use the latter. If you don't have an account, you can create one by clicking "Sign up".
instructions_2: Create a backup of your current configuration (recommended). This will allow you to restore your current setup if needed.
instructions_3:
Select your preferred preset.
The Factory option allows you to reset the account to the same state as a recently created one.
instructions_5:
Select your debrid service and enter the API key (optional).
If you choose not to include it, ‚ö†Ô∏è you will be torrenting ‚ö†Ô∏è. Please review your country's policies on torrenting before proceeding.
instructions_8: Customize the addons preset (optional). You have the option to remove or sort addons, and rename or delete the AIOLists/Anime Kitsu catalogs.
instructions_9: Once you have finished customizing, click "Sync to Stremio" to update your account.
instructions_10: Go to Stremio settings to adjust your preferred language options.
instructions_11: Enjoy your favorite movies, TV shows, and live TV!
warning:
You will wipe the existing setup. Recommended to create a backup before proceeding.
Use it at your own risk. No support is provided.
note: Note: If you need to change the language or change the debrid API key after clicking "Load Preset Addons", you will need to reload the page and start over.
how_to_get_authkey: How to get the Stremio Authkey?
how_step1_end: using your Stremio credentials in your browser.
how_step2_middle: and paste the following code snippet:
how_step3: Take the output value and paste it into the field.
faq_debrid_desc1: A debrid service is an unrestricted multi-hoster that allows you to stream and download videos instantly at the best speeds. In plain English, the debrid service acts as a middleman between the BitTorrent tracker and you, so you download the content directly from their servers at high speed. Most of the content is already cached, meaning you can instantly access it.
faq_debrid_benefit1: High-speed downloads, no buffering. Yes, including 4K content (your experience might vary based on your internet connection).
faq_debrid_benefit2: If you live in a country where internet providers monitor torrent activity, you are safe with one and there is no need for a VPN to stream.
faq_debrid_benefit3: Content may still be accessible even if the original source is no longer available.
faq_debrid_benefit4: A small cost gets you a Netflix-like experience for as little as US$3 per month.
faq_debrid_note: If you live in a country where torrenting is allowed or have a VPN and are okay with some buffering here and there, you can skip it.
faq_next_desc1: You can now start enjoying your favorite movies, TV shows, and live TV! The preset provides a solid foundation that should meet most people's needs. However, if you wish, you could update the addons configuration provided by the preset by accessing their respective settings in Stremio and/or add additional addons. All the available addons can be found
